Coda

Source: R/AllGenerics.R, R/coerce.R
coda.Rd

Extracts parallel chains from a MCMC object to create an mcmc.list object for use with coda diagnostic tools.

as_coda(from, ...)

# S4 method for MCMC
as_coda(from, chains = 1)

Arguments

from

from An object to be coerced.
...

Currently not used.
chains

An integer specifying the number of parallel chains (defaults to \(1\)).

Value

An coda::mcmc.list object.

See also

coda::mcmc(), coda::mcmc.list()

Other read: check, coerce(), read

Author

A. Philippe, M.-A. Vibet

Examples

## Coerce to MCMC
events <- as_mcmc(Events, iteration = 1)

## Coerce to coda
library(coda)
mcmc <- as_coda(events, chains = 3)
plot(mcmc)

gelman.diag(mcmc)

#> Potential scale reduction factors:
#> 
#>      Point est. Upper C.I.
#> [1,]          1          1
#> 

# The multivariate criterion can not be evaluated when a phase
# contains only one date. This induces colinearity problems.
gelman.diag(mcmc, multivariate = FALSE)

#> Potential scale reduction factors:
#> 
#>      Point est. Upper C.I.
#> [1,]          1          1
#>
